text: Coşkun Taş (23 April 1935 – 11 November 2024) was a Turkish international footballer. He played as a striker. He played club football in Turkey and Germany for Aydinspor, Beşiktaş, 1. FC Köln and Bonner SC. He made three appearances for the Turkey national football team in 1954. Taş died in Cologne, Germany on 11 November 2024, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Turkish footballers
title: Coşkun Taş
